Question: unerry Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Unerry Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:
- Unerry Inc. is showcasing their latest smartphone model at CES 2024
- The smartphone features a 6.7-inch OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate
- It is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor
- The device comes with a triple-lens rear camera system, including a 108MP main sensor
- It supports 5G connectivity and features a 4500mAh battery with fast charging capabilities
- The smartphone runs on the latest version of Android with Unerry's custom UI
- It offers 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage
- The device includes an in-display fingerprint sensor and stereo speakers tuned by a renowned audio company
Summary_cn:
Unerry Inc.

CES 2024产品亮点：
- Unerry Inc.在CES 2024展示他们最新的智能手机型号
- 该智能手机配备了6.7英寸OLED显示屏，刷新率为120Hz
- 它由高通骁龙8代2处理器提供动力
- 该设备配备了三镜头后置摄像头系统，包括一个1.08亿像素的主传感器
- 它支持5G连接，并配备了4500mAh的电池和快速充电功能
- 该智能手机运行最新版本的Android操作系统，带有Unerry定制的用户界面
- 它提供8GB的RAM和256GB的内存
- 该设备包括一个屏下指纹传感器和由知名音频公司调校的立体声扬声器
